user_input: Please create hourly Hybrid Heat Pump demand profiles for the TYNDP 2026 Scenarios. Use the 'NT', 'NT_HE' and 'NT_LE' Scenarios. Use the year 2030, 2035, 2040 and 2050. Split the nodes. Convert to tst format. Use Hydrogen as the complement not the carrier. No need to access any PLEXOS database for now.
author: Dante
default_llm_context: Perform the specified operation based on the user's input and the Terajoule Model specifications. Do not access the PLEXOS database; operate on external files only. Use functions to generate and export demand profiles.

function_args.user_input: Create hourly Hybrid Heat Pump demand profiles for TYNDP 2026 Scenarios 'NT', 'NT_HE', and 'NT_LE' for years 2030, 2035, 2040, and 2050. Split the nodes. Use Hydrogen as the complement (not the carrier). Do not access any PLEXOS database.

tasks.description: Generate hourly Hybrid Heat Pump demand profiles for TYNDP 2026 scenarios 'NT', 'NT_HE', and 'NT_LE' for years 2030, 2035, 2040, and 2050; split nodes; set Hydrogen as the complement (not the carrier).
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: '{user_input}', resolve all inputs required to generate hourly Hybrid Heat Pump demand profiles for scenarios ['NT','NT_HE','NT_LE'] and years [2030,2035,2040,2050], ensuring nodes are split and Hydrogen is treated as the complement, not the carrier. No PLEXOS DB access is required.

tasks.description: Export the generated hourly Hybrid Heat Pump demand profiles to the TYNDP standard TST format (carrier='Hybrid Heat Pump').
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: '{user_input}', export the previously generated hourly Hybrid Heat Pump demand profiles into TYNDP TST workbooks using carrier='Hybrid Heat Pump'. Use the full output of 'main_demand_processer_v2' as input.
